plot: Lim Jung-hwan is the successor of a large taxi company, and enjoys a lavish lifestyle. Reality kicks in as he has to work and live as a taxi driver to learn the trade. Yet even a taxi driver can find love.
title: Guseju 2
plot_es: Lim Jung-hwan is the successor of a large taxi company, and enjoys a lavish lifestyle. Reality kicks in as he has to work and live as a taxi driver to learn the trade. Yet even a taxi driver can find love.
plot_en: Lim Jung-hwan is the successor of a large taxi company, and enjoys a lavish lifestyle. Reality kicks in as he has to work and live as a taxi driver to learn the trade. Yet even a taxi driver can find love.
